### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23611](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23611) (build: add `LTO` option to depends by fanquake)
* [#22380](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22380) (build: add and use C_STANDARD and CXX_STANDARD in depends by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
